prereq.p:
Before you upgrade to the 7.0 SP5:
Ensure that you complete the following procedure specific to the Message Bridge:
Uninstall the earlier version of the Message Bridge.
The Proficy Server Message Bridge service is disabled.
Restart your computer.
Install the version of the Message Bridge included in the 7.0 SP5 installer.
Restart the Proficy Server Manager service.
The Proficy Server Message Bridge service is automatically restarted.
Ensure that you create a backup copy of the text file that includes the user-specific settings. The file is created in the directory <tomcat_home>/Apache Software Foundation/Tomcat 8.0/users/<user>, where:
<tomcat_home> is the directory where you installed Apache Tomcat. For example, C:/Program Files.
<user> is the name of a logged-in user. After you upgrade, you can copy-paste the file to the same location to replicate the user-specific settings. For more information, refer to the Help.

taskbody.context: You can upgrade any earlier service pack (SP) version of 7.0 to 7.0 SP5.The 7.0 SP5 installer is the base installer for all upgrade requirements. The base installer 7.0 SP1 is discontinued.

step.cmd: Run the installfrontend.exe file as an Administrator.
step.stepresult:
The installation menu appears, displaying the Install Proficy Plant Applications 7.0 screen.
You can hover over each task that appears in the installation menu to refer to the tooltip associated with that task.

step.cmd: Select Plant Applications Universal Client SP5.
step.stepresult:
The installer gathers the current configuration and determines the required configurations that need to be updated.
Then the upgrade wizard appears, displaying the Welcome to Plant Applications Universal Client screen.

step.cmd: In the Welcome to Plant Applications Universal Client screen, select Next.
step.stepresult:
If any of the required software is missing, the Prerequisites screen appears. In the Prerequisites screen, select Next to view all installed prerequisites and install any missing prerequisites.
If all the required software is installed, then the Read and accept the license agreement to continue screen appears.

step.cmd: Read the license agreement, select Accept, and then select Next to continue the upgrade.
step.stepresult: Depending on the contents to be upgraded, the upgrade process might take some time. A message appears in the wizard, indicating whether the upgrade was successful or not.

step.cmd: Select View Logs to see the upgrade details.
In the Upgrade Successful screen, select Exit to close the upgrade wizard.

taskbody.result: The earlier service pack version of 7.0 is successfully upgraded to the 7.0 SP5.
